verses.verse: If<WG1487> there be therefore<WG3767> any<WG1536> consolation<WG3874> in Christ,<WG5547> if<WG1487> any<WG1536> comfort<WG3890> of love,<WG26> if<WG1487> any<WG1536> fellowship<WG2842> of the Spirit,<WG4151> if<WG1487> any<WG1536> bowels<WG4698> and mercies,<WG3628>
Fulfill<WG4137> you my joy,<WG5479> that you be like minded,<WG3588> <WG5426> <WG2192> having the same<WG846> love,<WG26> being of one<WG4861> accord, of one<WG3888> <WG1520> mind.<WG5426>

Let nothing<WG3367> be done through<WG2596> strife<WG2052> or<WG2228> vainglory;<WG2754> but in lowliness<WG5012> of mind<WG5012> let each<WG240> esteem<WG2233> other<WG240> better<WG5242> than themselves.<WG1438>
Look<WG4648> not every<WG1538> man on his own<WG1438> things, but every<WG1538> man also<WG2532> on the things of others.<WG2087>
Let this<WG5124> mind<WG5426> be in you, which<WG3739> was also<WG2532> in Christ<WG5547> Jesus:<WG2424>
Who, being<WG5225> in the form<WG3444> of God,<WG2316> thought<WG2233> it not robbery<WG725> to be equal<WG2470> with God:<WG2316>
But made<WG1096> himself<WG1438> of no<WG5013> reputation,<WG2758> and took<WG2983> on him the form<WG3444> of a servant,<WG1401> and was made<WG1096> in the likeness<WG3667> of men:<WG444>

And being found<WG2147> in fashion<WG4976> as a man,<WG444> he humbled<WG5013> himself,<WG1438> and became<WG1096> obedient<WG5255> to death,<WG2288> even<WG1161> the death<WG2288> of the cross.<WG4716>
Why<WG1352> God<WG2316> also<WG2532> has highly<WG5251> exalted<WG5251> him, and given<WG5483> him a name<WG3686> which<WG3588> is above<WG5228> every<WG3956> name:<WG3686>
That at<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of Jesus<WG2424> every<WG3956> knee<WG1119> should bow,<WG2578> of things in heaven,<WG2032> and things in earth,<WG1919> and things under<WG2709> the earth;<WG2709>
And that every<WG3956> tongue<WG1100> should confess<WG1843> that Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> is Lord,<WG2962> to the glory<WG1391> of God<WG2316> the Father.<WG3962>

Why,<WG5620> my beloved,<WG27> as you have always<WG3842> obeyed,<WG5219> not as in my presence<WG3952> only,<WG3440> but now<WG3568> much<WG4183> more<WG3123> in my absence,<WG666> work<WG2716> out your<WG1438> own<WG1438> salvation<WG4991> with fear<WG5401> and trembling.<WG5156>
For it is God<WG2316> which<WG3588> works<WG1754> in you both<WG2532> to will<WG2309> and to do<WG1754> of his good pleasure.<WG2107>
Do<WG4160> all<WG3956> things without<WG5565> murmurings<WG1112> and disputings:<WG1261>

That you may be blameless<WG273> and harmless,<WG185> the sons<WG5043> of God,<WG2316> without<WG298> rebuke,<WG298> in the middle<WG3319> of a crooked<WG4646> and perverse<WG1294> nation,<WG1074> among<WG1722> whom<WG3739> you shine<WG5316> as lights<WG5458> in the world;<WG2889>

Holding<WG1907> forth<WG1907> the word<WG3056> of life;<WG2222> that I may rejoice<WG2745> in the day<WG2250> of Christ,<WG5547> that I have not run<WG5143> in vain,<WG2756> neither<WG3761> labored<WG2872> in vain.<WG2756>
Yes,<WG235> and if<WG1487> I be offered<WG4689> on the sacrifice<WG2378> and service<WG3009> of your<WG5216> faith,<WG4102> I joy,<WG5463> and rejoice<WG4796> with you all.<WG3956>
For the same<WG846> cause also<WG2532> do you joy,<WG5463> and rejoice<WG4796> with me.

But I trust<WG1679> in the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> to send<WG3992> Timotheus<WG5095> shortly<WG5030> to you, that I also<WG2504> may be of good comfort,<WG2174> when I know<WG1097> your<WG5216> state.<WG3588> <WG4012>
For I have<WG2192> no<WG3762> man<WG3762> like minded,<WG2473> who<WG3748> will naturally<WG1104> care<WG3309> for your<WG5216> state.<WG3588> <WG4012>
For all<WG3956> seek<WG2212> their own, not the things which are Jesus<WG2424> Christ's.<WG5547>
But you know<WG1097> the proof<WG1382> of him, that, as a son<WG5043> with the father,<WG3962> he has served<WG1398> with me in the gospel.<WG2098>
Him therefore<WG3767> I hope<WG1679> to send<WG3992> presently,<WG1824> so<WG5613> soon as I shall see<WG542> how<WG4012> it will go with me.
But I trust<WG3982> in the Lord<WG2962> that I also<WG2532> myself shall come<WG2064> shortly.<WG5030>

Yet<WG1161> I supposed<WG2233> it necessary<WG316> to send<WG3992> to you Epaphroditus,<WG1891> my brother,<WG80> and companion<WG4904> in labor,<WG4904> and fellow soldier,<WG4961> but your<WG5216> messenger,<WG652> and he that ministered<WG3011> to my wants.<WG5532>
For he longed<WG1971> after<WG1971> you all,<WG3956> and was full of heaviness,<WG85> because<WG1360> that you had heard<WG191> that he had been sick.<WG770>

For indeed<WG2532> he was sick<WG770> near<WG3897> to death:<WG2288> but God<WG2316> had mercy<WG1653> on him; and not on him only,<WG3440> but on me also,<WG2532> lest<WG2443> <WG3361> I should have<WG2192> sorrow<WG3077> on sorrow.<WG3077>
I sent<WG3992> him therefore<WG3767> the more<WG4708> carefully,<WG4708> that, when you see<WG1492> him again,<WG3825> you may rejoice,<WG5463> and that I may be the less<WG253> sorrowful.<WG253>
Receive<WG4327> him therefore<WG3767> in the Lord<WG2962> with all<WG3956> gladness;<WG5479> and hold<WG2192> such<WG5108> in reputation:<WG1784>

Because<WG3754> for the work<WG2041> of Christ<WG5547> he was near<WG1448> to death,<WG2288> not regarding<WG3851> his life,<WG5590> to supply<WG378> your<WG5216> lack<WG5303> of service<WG3009> toward<WG4314> me.
